Question
========

From a population of men whose height is distributed according to a normal distribution with μ = 175 and σ = 8, two men are randomly and independently of each other, two men are drawn. The probability that both men are taller than 179 is

Answerlist
----------

* 0.0952
* 0.3085
* 0.4782
* 0.617

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.0952: Correct
* 0.3085: Incorrect
* 0.4782: Incorrect
* 0.617: Incorrect
